titles.title: SECURE Act
SECURE Act
State Efforts to Create Underground Regulatory Efficiency Act

To increase the authorization of appropriations for grants to States to defray the expenses of the States related to the establishment and operation of a State underground injection control program for permitting Class VI wells for the injection of carbon dioxide.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Environment and Climate Change.

bill.summary:
State Efforts to Create Underground Regulatory Efficiency Act or the SECURE Act
This bill increases the authorized appropriations for certain grants to support states, tribes, and territories with developing and implementing underground injection control programs for wells that are used to inject carbon dioxide into deep rock formations (i.e., geologic sequestration).
